text:
F. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
M. S. NOVIK, Director
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2-5600
WNYC
And
Stations
WASJ
WKDX
WBCD
W2XRG
W2XVP
February 311 th, 1939
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
National Association df Educations, Broadcasters
WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Mr. Schooley;
In checking over the files, I have found that
your recent letter did not enclose the list of your members
as stated.
If you will send it on to me, we will be very
glad to send them a copy of our printed quarterly, The Masterwork
Bulletin, which lists our musical programs as well as other
outstanding programs.
MSN; c
60
’New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
